category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCVIS_ForceReloadJT_After_ApplyBOMConfiguration
preference.preference_description: Indicates if should force reload JT for involved BOM lines after apply BOM configuration change. Valid Values: * true: Force reload JT data for involved BOM lines after applying BOM configuration change. * false: Do not reload JT data for involved BOM lines after applying BOM configuration change. This is the default value. Please note: Force reload JT for BOM lines are based on current graphics viewer session's loading history, only those that were previously loaded on graphics viewer can be force reloaded. For now this behavior only applies to Variant Configuration change on leaf BOM lines.
